Class LoggerController

java.lang.Object
org.supsi.controller.logger.LoggerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILoggerController
public class LoggerController extends Object implements ILoggerController
The LoggerController class manages the logging behavior of the application, coordinating between the logger model and user preferences. It is responsible for loading logging preferences and adding log messages.
